title: J&J Chief Scientific Officer on Covid-19 Vaccine
itunes:title: J&J Chief Scientific Officer on Covid-19 Vaccine
description:
Dr. Paul Stoffels, Chief Scientific Officer of Johnson & Johnson, discusses his company's COVID-19 vaccine. He talks about J&J's one-shot vaccine generating strong protection against Covid-19 in a large, late-stage trial.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
